variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gnuconfig
dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.

dependencies.name: uuid
dependencies.description:
OSSP uuid is a ISO-C:1999 application programming interface (API) and
corresponding command line interface (CLI) for the generation of DCE
1.1, ISO/IEC 11578:1996 and RFC 4122 compliant Universally Unique
Identifier (UUID).

dependent_to.name: httpd
dependent_to.description:
The Apache HTTP Server is a powerful and flexible HTTP/1.1 compliant web
server.

dependent_to.name: subversion
dependent_to.description: Apache Subversion - an open source version control system.

dependent_to.name: serf
dependent_to.description:
Apache Serf - a high performance C-based HTTP client library built upon
the Apache Portable Runtime (APR) library

dependent_to.name: libapreq2
dependent_to.description:
httpd-apreq is subproject of the Apache HTTP Server Project whose
committers develop and maintain the libapreq C library and its language
bindings for Perl (contributions for additional language bindings are
most welcome).
